title: Ask Me! Shapes and Colors Free
creator: Eggroll Games

extendedInfo.description: Ask Me! Shapes and Colors encourages learning through narrated rhyme and hand-clapping music with over 100 cute and colorful items! Identify tons of candies, toys, foods, clothing, vehicles, animals and fun characters like Millie Monster and Silly Snake! =====================================* Helpful hints ensure frustration-free play.* Incorrect answers are simply removed to reinforce a positive learning experience.* Correct answers are rewarded with timed whack 'em games and balloon popping fun.* Parental controls allow you to turn off sounds, music, purchases and links to our other apps.* Eggroll Games are designed for kids and contain no ads.* Your privacy is important to us. We do not collect personal information from our users.====================================="This app is perfect for kids learning their shapes and colors. It has different learning modes, cute pictures, and fun music that I found myself even getting into!""Another great app from Eggroll Games. They just keep getting better and better. The music is so catchy and fun. My kids love playing it!""Love this game. It's simple and colorful. No ads, you can turn off in-app purchases and music. The best game!"=====================================Celebrating over 1,000,000 downloads, Eggroll Games builds interactive toys that promote learning and engage children through colorful interactivity without confusing buttons or menus. Find us on Facebook at facebook.com/eggrollgames, follow us on Twitter @eggrollgames or drop in for a visit at EggrollGames.com!Thank you for supporting us! reviews.title: Great!!!!
reviews.comment: This app is so cute and useful. The characters are very cute and the app is very functional. You will definitely love it!!
reviews.author: Sudipta Kar

reviews.title: Awesome Fun!
reviews.comment: This is such a cute and creative way to learn colors and shapes!
reviews.author: Orion Adelman

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app for kids. Has lots of different items.
reviews.author: Amanda Linn

reviews.title: So cute
reviews.comment: My kid love to play this game. Lovely voice over and really good exercises.
reviews.author: Oshrat Raz
